data.author: Atadore SARL

changelog.release_notes: Support for Pebble 2.  Menu customization on the original pebble should be less crashy. Please support this app at 4r.io/pn

Fixed issue with original Pebbles.  Sorry!

Please support this app at 4r.io/pn
Fixes blank screen on search. Please support this app at 4r.io/pn

Fixes "Content can not be displayed".
Notebooks (including stacks), Tags (including tag hierarchies) and Saved Searches supported
You can now customize the root menu, including moving items around, under Settings.  Long-press select to move items.
Please support this app at 4r.io/pn

You can now launch straight into shortcuts or todos using the Pebble's quick launch capability.

If you use this app, please support it at http://4r.io/pn

Longer note content is now displayed on Pebble Time, although at some point it might be easier just to pull out your phone ...

Shortcuts are automatically refreshed, so that the weird "Clear Cache" option that didn't seem do to anything is now gone too.

Added a "Tiny" note font size option for those of you not even close to middle age.

To Dos are no longer duplicated on iOS if you add more than one of them to a note on your phone.
To Dos are no longer duplicated on iOS if you add more than one of them to a note on your phone.

ümlauts are nöw displayed pröperly.

If you appreciate this app, please help fund the development at http://4r.io/pn

January is now displayed as "Jan" rather than "?".  Turns out I was the only one who used that abbreviation.
You can now set reminders in the afternoon if you use am/pm rather than 24h.  But 24h is better, trust me.

If you use this app,  please help fund the development at http://4r.io/pn
Support for shortcuts to notes and support for the original Pebble.

Checkboxes should now check.

Long menu items scroll.  

Choose your own text and background colors under Settings.

Press Select on a note to add text to the note, add a checkbox to the note or set a reminder on the note.

data.description:
Create and search Evernote notes by voice.  Check off checkbox items, view color images from your notes, append to existing notes and more.

Notes you've modified recently as well as Evernote reminders are automatically added to your timeline.  You can add a reminder to a note by pressing Select when viewing it.

Powernoter is in no way affiliated with Evernote.

Show your appreciation at http://4r.io/pn

latest_release.release_notes: Support for Pebble 2.  Menu customization on the original pebble should be less crashy. Please support this app at 4r.io/pn

data.title: Powernoter
